summary: PigeonCoin ($PIGEON) - PigeonCoin is more than just a meme coin; it's a beacon of peace, promoting to convey a message of non-violence to humanity worldwide. Throughout history, our world has been scarred by millions of wars, each resulting in devastation, the destruction of nations, and the suffering of innocent civilians burdened by the consequences of conflict. PigeonCoin, therefore, embraces a humble mission: to contribute to a world of peace and happiness. Let us unite in this endeavor, using every means at our disposal, to promote harmony and tranquility for all.
